title: beautiful place
review: mandal river is very beautiful place i enjoy a loot with my friends .there is in corbett national park.

title: Nice...
review: Mandal River is a part of River Ramganga. It passes through the famous Jim Corbett national park. It emerges from Chamoli District. It almost covers the entire Jim Corbett National Park. It is also a breeding place for one of the most endangered species of fish named Mahseer. The landscape around the river basin is breathtaking.

title: Very good
review: It is in Jim Corbett National Park and again an important part of its ecology. Very good and one can enjoy around the river.

title: source of water and electricity in Nainital
review: The river flows near Corbett National Park, it is a tributary of the Ramganga.Flows through the Kumaon district.

title: Nice view of the place
review: This is a prominent river flowing through the Corbett National Park and the view of this place is just amazing... One must give it a visit once..

title: Nice...If you are in Jim Corbett
review: A river that flows through Jim Corbett national park. One can only enjoy near around of the river if you decides to have a trip of Jim Corbett national park only. I wont called it as such a major tourist point as such though.

title: small river
review: same as palan river ..water is less in summer but in rainy season it rises many many fold .. the river is prone to flood during any season ... if it rains heaively in area ...

title: Small River But Floods in Monsoon
review: This river flows through the Jim Corbett reserve and was low when we were there but you could see the boulders that had been moved during the monsoon period. Lots of bird life- we even saw a kingfisher. Lots of deer roaming on the river bed. Peaceful and good if you happen to be there.
